description: This course is designed for adult learners who are going to university for the first time or are planning to return to study after some time away from education. As a mature student in the contemporary world of education, there are many new things to learn besides your chosen subject of study. One of the key skills you must learn is how to utilise your time in order to meet your academic goals. Time management is something students of all ages can master with practice and discipline. This course is designed to help you get on the right path before becoming a student or give you some strategies for improving your time management skills as a mature student in general.
title: Prioritising Wisely: Time Management for Mature Students
